roleset.name: display, show, reveal, introduction of something new

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: The Avon , Conn. , company 's stock hit a high in 1983 after it unveiled its Adam home computer , but the product was plagued with glitches and the company 's fortunes plunged .

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Amazon unveiled its Japanese language website , which will feature 1.7 million Japanese and English language book titles .
example.arg: its Japanese language website , which will feature 1.7 million Japanese and English language book titles

example.name: just arg1
example.text: There is a scene at the end of the first week 's show where Mancuso attends the unveiling of the memorial to his dead partner David .
example.arg: of the memorial to his dead partner David

example.name: font dorks! args 0 & 1.
example.text: Their unveiling of the font family Forza has me super stoked .

example.name: args1 and 2
example.text: In readiness for its unveiling to the public , the new Acne Studio on Dover Street 's windows are covered in a collage of pages from the Acne Paper

roleset.note: UNVEIL-V NOTES: No comparison. No Vncls. (from unveil.01-v)
UNVEILING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on unveil-v.01. No corresponding VNcls. (from unveiling.01-n)
